H0.text: under article 1 what is the minimum age required to serve in the house of representatives. 18

H1.text: under article 1 what is the minimum age required to serve in the house of representatives. 30

H2.text: under article 1 what is the minimum age required to serve in the house of representatives. 21

H3.text: under article 1 what is the minimum age required to serve in the house of representatives. 25

A4.text: No Person shall be a Representative who shall not have attained to the Age of twenty five Years, and been seven Years a Citizen of the United States, and who shall not, when elected, be an Inhabitant of that State in which he shall be chosen.

A5.text: A senator must be at least 30 years of age, must have been a citizen of the United States for at least nine years before being elected, and must reside in the State they will represent at the time of the election.
